abstract: Bank of America‘s board is not planning to remove the company’s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, after he was ousted as chairman under shareholder pressure, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America‘s board is not planning to remove the company’s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, after he was ousted as chairman under shareholder pressure, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Bank of America’s Lewis Safe as C.E.O., Report Says
